Description: {{PageRef|Other|alt_name=General Change}}s
* Playtesting times are now starting 1 hour earlier. Weekdays are 6PM PDT and weekends are 4PM PDT.
* Redesigned the {{PageRef|Walker}} model and visuals
* Added ambient sound effects
* Added jar smash sound effects
* Updated {{PageRef|Cold Front}} sound effects
* Improved NPC/minion weapon fire audio feedback for victims
* Improved player damage received audio feedback
* Updated {{PageRef|Lash}} {{PageRef|Death Slam}} sound effects
* Various minor fixes to {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} and {{PageRef|Death Slam}} effects
* {{PageRef|Warden}}'s {{PageRef|Last Stand}} has improved visual effects
* Fixed a bug where the shopping book visuals could get stuck on your hero
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}'s {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} projectile effect indicates the radius more accurately now
* New voice for {{PageRef|Warden}} (in advance of upcoming model swap)
* {{PageRef|Patron}}s will now play a voice warning when {{PageRef|Rejuvenator}} time is close to expiring as well as when it's expired
* Updated VO for {{PageRef|Amber Hand}}'s {{PageRef|Patron}}
* Increased the duration of the item-used popup text a bit
* Fixed a bug where {{PageRef|Warden}}'s second and third abilities were swapped VO wise
* Fixed {{PageRef|Time Wall}} damaging units that don't move multiple times instead of once per walk through
* Added a short wall between {{PageRef|Shrine}}s level of the base and the Weakened {{PageRef|Patron}} level
* Moved the taxi back into the street to fix players getting stuck between the front and the building corner
* Moved a truck away from the garage to give wide enough path for {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}
* Added clips to both sides of the overpass on outer lanes to keep from hitting your head on the ledge when climbing
* Added clips at outer lane T1 stairs where you could get stuck doing a roll slide
* Fixed {{PageRef|Vindicta}} being able to shoot above the base wall
* Fixed gaps where you could climb outside of the map
* Added a wall between the T1 {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}} and the hallway on the outer lanes by the Fire House and the Chapel to prevent attackers from shooting the T1 without taking damage
* Fixed a couple of spots where Mo could get stuck between a truck and wall
* Replaced news stand that was close to the T1 with different cover kiosk building to avoid {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}} confusion
* Fixed no collision on water tower on the garage roof.
{{PageRef|Other|alt_name=Misc Gameplay}} Changes
* Medium and Hard {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} now spawn at 7 minutes
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s now have 20% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Basement}} {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} now have +2 Medium {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} and -4 Small {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}}
* {{PageRef|Basement}} {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} are now classified as a Medium camp instead of a Small camp (for the purposes of spawn time)

* Fixed various abuses where you can shoot {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} without them being able to shoot back. {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s now become invulnerable when they have no line of sight of you for 2 seconds.
* Spirit scaling reduced by ~19% (the total effective Spirit damage is reduced by less than this, this is just the Spirit multiplier scaling portion and has largest impact on late game burst)
* Respawn curve adjusted slightly (results in a few seconds of increased respawn time in the mid phase, same overall max respawn time)
* {{PageRef|Zipline}} Boost ability is now available at the start of the game (used to start on cooldown)
* Shield break cooldown reduced from 80s to 60s
* {{PageRef|Trooper}}s run speed increased from 10 m/s to 11 m/s
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}} health increased from 200 to 240
Item Gameplay Changes

* Added a new T3 Spirit {{PageRef|Item}}, Shifting Shroud. Innate: +10% Fire Rate. Active: You become invulnerable for 2.5s, during which you cannot move or perform any actions. When your invulnerability expires, your {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} is instantly reloaded and you gain 14 bonus Spirit for 6s. Cooldown: 70s.
* {{PageRef|Mystic Burst}}: Bonus damage reduced from +40 to +35
* Medic Bullets: Cooldown reduced from 5s to 4s
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}: Headshot damage increased from +30 to +50
* {{PageRef|Close Quarters}}: Bullet Shield increased from 70 to 85
* {{PageRef|Close Quarters}}: Weapon Damage reduced from 30% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Healing Rite}}: Cooldown reduced from 90s to 80s
* {{PageRef|Kinetic Dash}}: No longer gives +1 Stamina
* {{PageRef|Kinetic Dash}}: Now causes your dash-jumps to only require 1 stamina
* {{PageRef|Berserker}}: Weapon Damage Per Stack increased from 5% to 6%
* {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}: Cooldown increased from 3s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}}: Now provides a Spirit Shield instead of a Bullet Shield
* Health Nova: Now provides +50 Health
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Now also reflects 30% of Spirit damage (requires line of sight)
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Bullet damage returned reduced from 75% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Fixed not returning fire to {{PageRef|McGinnis}}' sentries
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Now applies 8% Spirit Amp instead of -15% Bullet Resist
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Cooldown increased from 20s to 35s
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Now does 2.2% Max HP DPS instead of flat DPS
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Now gives +4 Spirit
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Moved from T2 to T3
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Now grants +150 Bullet Shield
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Now grants +12% Weapon Damage
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Min/Max DPS increased from 40/80 to 45/85
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: You can now use the active again while in the air to dive down faster
* {{PageRef|Improved Burst}}: Max HP bonus damage reduced from 13% to 11%
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Cast range increased from 40m to 50m
* {{PageRef|Mystic Slow}}: Now requires {{PageRef|Suppressor}} as a component
* {{PageRef|Mystic Slow}}: Now provides +75 Health, +3 Regen and +6 spirit
* {{PageRef|Mystic Slow}}: Fire Rate slow increased from 20% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Lifestrike}}: Cooldown reduced from 8s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Now applies -25% Bullet Resist instead of 25% Spirit Amp
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Now grants +15% Ammo
* {{PageRef|Warp Stone}}: Removed cast time
* {{PageRef|Diviner's Kevlar}}: Now triggers off of casting ultimates. Grants 700 bullet shield and 40 spirit for 10 seconds.
* {{PageRef|Echo Shard}}: No longer gives +20 Spirit for the second cast
* {{PageRef|Mystic Reverb}}: Extra damage on the reverb reduced from 40% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Frenzy}}: Bonus health increased from +150 to +200
Hero Gameplay Changes
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} T3 now applies the silence on cast instead of detonation
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} T3 silence duration reduced from 5s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Now has +10% Base Spirit Resistance
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} T1 increased from +35% to +40% Fire Rate Slow
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Ice Path}} T3 Now gains 1 Spirit per meter of {{PageRef|Ice Path}} trail created. Max of 40 Spirit.
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Charged Shot}} cooldown reduced from 18s to 16s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} cooldown increased from 25s to 27s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} cooldown reduced from 45s to 35s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} T1 changed to +4 Invis Sprint
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}} T2 is now -20s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Afterburn}} T2 now reduces enemy Spirit damage by 30%
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: True Form cooldown reduced from 50s to 40s
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Soul Exchange}} now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} Stomp Damage reduced from 125 to 110
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Death Slam}} cooldown increased from 110s to 130s
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Grapple}} Bullet Damage bonus increased from +4 to +6
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Grapple}} cooldown decreased from 45s to 40s
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}} T1 is now +1 Charge and +25% Movement Slow
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}} T2 is now +10m Attack Range and +10% Fire Rate
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Wall}} cooldown reduced from 40s to 35s
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} T3 reduced from +75% to +50%
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} spirit bullet damage now has range effectiveness (previously the magic bullets did max damage from any range)
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} T2 bonus spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} no longer goes on cooldown when it is interrupted during its initial cast delay
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: Shadow Explosion cooldown reduced from 120s to 90s
